type.name: org.gradle.plugins.signing.Signature
type.description:
A digital signature file artifact.

A signature file is always generated from another file, which may be a PublishArtifact.

method.name: getSignatory
method.description:
The signatory of this signature file.

returns:The signatory. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getToSign
method.description:
The file that is to be signed.

returns:The file. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getName
method.description:
The name of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the name of the signature #getFile() file.

returns:The name. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getClassifier
method.description:
The classifier of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the classifier of the source artifact (if signing an artifact) or the given classifier at construction (if given).



returns:The classifier. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: generate
getType
method.description:
The type of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the extension of the #getToSign() file to sign plus the extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type. For example, when signing the file ‘my.zip’ with a signature type with extension ‘sig’, the default type is ‘zip.sig’.



returns:The type. May be null if the file to sign or signature type are unknown at this time.

method.name: getDate
method.description:
The date of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the last modified time of the #getFile() signature file (if exists)



returns:The date of the signature. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getExtension
method.description:
The extension of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the specified file extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type.



returns:The extension. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getFile
method.description:
The file for the generated signature, which may not yet exist.

Defaults to a file alongside the #getToSign() file to sign with the extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type.



returns:The signature file. May be null if unknown at this time.

method.name: getSignatureType
method.description:
The file representation type of the signature.

returns:The signature type. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: name
property.description:
The name of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the name of the signature #getFile() file.

returns:The name. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: signatory
property.description:
The signatory of this signature file.

returns:The signatory. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: classifier
property.description:
The classifier of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the classifier of the source artifact (if signing an artifact) or the given classifier at construction (if given).



returns:The classifier. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: type
property.description:
The type of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the extension of the #getToSign() file to sign plus the extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type. For example, when signing the file ‘my.zip’ with a signature type with extension ‘sig’, the default type is ‘zip.sig’.



returns:The type. May be null if the file to sign or signature type are unknown at this time.

property.name: toSign
property.description:
The file that is to be signed.

returns:The file. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: file
property.description:
The file for the generated signature, which may not yet exist.

Defaults to a file alongside the #getToSign() file to sign with the extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type.



returns:The signature file. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: date
property.description:
The date of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the last modified time of the #getFile() signature file (if exists)



returns:The date of the signature. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: extension
property.description:
The extension of the signature artifact.

Defaults to the specified file extension of the #getSignatureType() signature type.



returns:The extension. May be null if unknown at this time.

property.name: signatureType
property.description:
The file representation type of the signature.

returns:The signature type. May be null if unknown at this time.
